revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: ==English== {{wikipedia}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|ta|யாழ்}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|musical instrument}} A fretless harp of ancient Tamil origin, with a variable number of gut strings, characterized by a boat-shaped resonator. ====Synonyms==== * {{l|en|yaaḻ}} ====See also==== * [[Appendix:Glossary of chordophones]] ====References==== * 1966. [https://books.google.com/books?id=uv0tAAAAMAAJ&q=yazh&dq=yazh&hl=en&sa=X&ved=0CEMQ6AEwCTgKahUKEwj5_5jgy-fHAhWEcD4KHeGJB_M ''Indian Aesthetics: Music and Dance'']. K. S. Ramaswami Sastri. Pg. 21. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=ahyz|hazy}} [[Category:en:String instruments]]
